relatedanime.anime: Gekijouban Yuu Gi Ou: Chou Yuugou! Toki o Koeta Kizuna

anime.description: Music video for jealkb`s "makemagic" song. It is done in a paper cutout stop motion animation style focusing on a girl getting transported to a kingdom by a wizard. During a party she`s frightened by the sudden marriage proposal by the prince and runs back into the arms of the wizard. The band itself is depicted in the anime in the same style--as photograph cutouts. The MV aired on NHK`s E-Tele "Digista Teens" program. This was also the title song for Gekijouban http://anidb.net/a7036 [Yuu Gi Ou: Chou Yuugou! Toki o Koeta Kizuna]. Source: MAL

tag.name: stop motion
tag.description: Stop motion (also known as stop-action or frame-by-frame) is an animation technique to make a physically manipulated object appear to move on its own. The object is moved in small increments between individually photographed frames, creating the illusion of movement when the series of frames is played as a continuous sequence.

tag.name: no dialogue
tag.description: The anime either has no spoken dialogue or no dialogue at all.

tag.name: slide show animation
tag.description: The entire anime or parts of it show sequences of still images. Sometimes used in low budged animations for action scenes.

tag.name: live-action imagery
tag.description: This anime incorporates still images and/or video footage of real-world objects and locations into the animation.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.
